```{r,cache=TRUE}

set.seed(42)
n_simulation <- 5000

n<-30
m <-100
prob <- 0.1

itet <- 100
alpha <- 0.01
z <- qnorm(1-alpha/2)
#z <- qnorm(0.99)
ite_l <- matrix(0,nrow=n_simulation,ncol=itet+1)
b <- 0.5*z^2
cover1=cover2=cover3=cover4=NULL
t <- 1
while(t <=n_simulation){
  
  binom_sample <- rbinom(n=n,size=1,prob=prob)
  if(sum(binom_sample)>0){
      MLE <- mean(binom_sample)
  #MLE <- MLE*(n-1)/n #bias-reduced MLE
  UPB <- MLE+z*sqrt(MLE* (1-MLE)/n   )
  LB <- MLE -z*sqrt(MLE* (1-MLE)/n   )
  cover1=c(cover1,( prob<=UPB  & prob>=LB  ))
  ite_l[t,1] <- MLE

  est_P <- c()


  t1<-c()
  t1[1] <- 0
for(i in 1:itet){

  boot_sp <-  replicate(m,(mean(rbinom(n=n,size=1,prob=MLE))))
  upper_bounds <- boot_sp+(z+t1[i])*sqrt(boot_sp* (1-boot_sp)/n   )
  lower_bounds <- boot_sp-(z+t1[i])*sqrt(boot_sp* (1-boot_sp)/n   )
  est_P[i] <- sum(upper_bounds>=prob &lower_bounds<=prob) /m
  # theta_star <- quantile(upper_bounds,0.05)
  # t[i] <- theta_star-MLE

    t1[i+1] <- t1[i] +0.1/i *(1-alpha-est_P[i])



}

  UPB_corrected <- MLE+(z+t1[itet+1])*sqrt(MLE* (1-MLE)/n   )#UPB+t1[itet+1]
  LB_corrected <-  MLE-(z+t1[itet+1])*sqrt(MLE* (1-MLE)/n   )#UPB+t1[itet+1]
  cover2=c(cover2,(prob<=UPB_corrected& prob>=LB_corrected)) # & prob>=LB_corrected
  
  ##wh
  a_gamma <- sqrt(4*sqrt(1+z^2)-4-z^2)
  Tb <- MLE+a_gamma*(0.5-MLE)/(sqrt(n)+a_gamma)
  ub_tb <- Tb+(sqrt(1+n*z^2)+1)/(2*n)
  lb_tb <- Tb-(sqrt(1+n*z^2)+1)/(2*n)
  cover3=c(cover3,(prob<=ub_tb & prob>=lb_tb))#c(cover3,(lambda<=MLE+(z+c_hat)*MLE/sqrt(n)))
# #   
#   
#    #boot3<- replicate(100,(1/mean(rgamma(n=n,rate=MLE,shape = 1))))
#      transformed_UPB <- exp(log(MLE)+z/sqrt(n))
#    #c_hat <-  (as.numeric(quantile(boot3,0.99))-MLE)*sqrt(n)/(MLE)-z
#      cover3=c(cover3,(lambda<transformed_UPB))#c(cover3,(lambda<=MLE+(z+c_hat)*MLE/sqrt(n)))
#      
#   ##exact
#      exact_ub <- qchisq(0.99,df=2*n)/(2*sum(gamma_sample))
#      cover4=c(cover4,(lambda<exact_ub))#
    t<- t+1
  }

}

p1=mean(cover1)
p2=mean(cover2)
p3=mean(cover3)
#p4=mean(cover4)
me1=qnorm(0.995)*sqrt(p1*(1-p1)/n_simulation);me1=round(me1,3)
me2=qnorm(0.995)*sqrt(p2*(1-p2)/n_simulation);me2=round(me2,3)
me3=qnorm(0.995)*sqrt(p3*(1-p3)/n_simulation);me3=round(me3,3)
#me4=qnorm(0.995)*sqrt(p4*(1-p4)/n_simulation);me4=round(me4,3)
cat("Coverage of ordinary CI=",p1,"plus or minus",me1,"\n")
cat("Coverage of iE adjusted CI=",p2,"plus or minus",me2,"\n")
cat("Coverage of corrected CI=",p3,"plus or minus",me3,"\n")
#cat("Coverage of exact CI=",p4,"plus or minus",me4,"\n")
```
